channel.title: tool on The Portal of Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in tool on The Portal of Knowledge

item.title: How to collect Outlook rules using Powershell
item.description: Implementation in Powershell of a tool that collects the Outlook rules.

item.title: Path-traversal archiver
item.description: A python tool to create archives containing path-traversal filenames.

item.title: Known-plaintext attack tool for XOR-encrypted data
item.description: In this article we present a cryptanalysis tool which is designed to help with known-plaintext attacks on XOR-encrypted data.

item.title: MSSQL shell with file upload capability
item.description: Implementation in Python of a MSSQL shell with file upload capability using the xp_cmdshell stored procedure.

item.title: WinRM shell (a.k.a. PowerShell Remoting) with file upload capability
item.description: Implementation in Ruby of a WinRM shell (a.k.a. PowerShell Remoting) with file upload capability.
